rukus.text: 72|1|[Ej pajomʙar] Bigu: «Ba man vahj sudaast, ki guruhe az cinnijon [ʙa in Qur'on] gus faro dodaand, pas, guftand: «Be gumon, mo Qur'one sigiftovar sunidem
72|2|Ki ʙa rohi rost hidojat mekunad. Pas, mo ʙa on imon ovardem va hargiz kasero ʙo Parvardigoramon sarik qaror namedihem
72|3|Va in ki sa'nu azamati Parvardigoramon ʙas [azimu] ʙaland ast. U [hargiz ʙaroi xud] hamsaru farzande intixoʙ nakardaast
72|4|Va in ki safeh [-u nodon]-i mo [sajton] dar ʙorai Alloh taolo suxanoni noravoe meguft
72|5|Va mo [cunin] gumon mekardem, ki hargiz insu cin ʙar Alloh taolo duruƣ nameʙandand
72|6|Va in ki mardone az odamijon ʙa mardone az cinnijon panoh meʙurdand va [ʙad-in vasila] ʙar gumrohi va sarkasii eson meafzudand
72|7|Va in ki onon [kofiron] gumon mekardand – hamon guna ki sumo [cinnijon] mepindosted – ki Alloh taolo hec kasro [duʙora] zinda namegardonad
72|8|Va in ki mo osmonro custucu kardem, pas, onro pur az muhofizoni nerumand va tirhoi sihoʙ joftem
72|9|Va in ki dar [osmon] ʙaroi sunidan ʙa kamin menisastem, [ammo] aknun har ki ʙixohad ʙa gus ʙosad, tiri sihoʙe dar kamini xud mejoʙad
72|10|Va in ki mo namedonem, ojo ʙaroi ahli zamin sarre iroda suda, jo Parvardigorason xajru hidojati esonro xostaast
72|11|Va in ki dar mijoni mo afrode soleh va afrode nodurust, mo guruhhoe mutafovit [va gunogun] hastem
72|12|Va in ki mo jaqin dorem, ki hargiz nametavonem dar ruji zamin Allohro ocizu notavon kunem va hargiz ʙo gurez nametavonem, Uro notavon sozem [va rohi firore nadorem]
72|13|Va in ki mo hangome ki [suxani] hidojatro sunidem, ʙa on imon ovardem. Pas, har kase, ki ʙa Parvardigoras imon ovarad, na az nuqson meharosadu na az sitam [ʙim dorad]
72|14|Va in ki guruhe az mo musulmon va guruhe kofir [va zolim] hastand. Pas, har kas, ki islom ovarda, ononand, ki rohi rastagoriro custucu karda [va ʙarguzida]-and
72|15|Va ammo kofiron [va sitamgoron] hezumi [otasi] cahannam xohand ʙud
72|16|Va in ki agar onho ʙar rohi rost pojdori kunand, alʙatta, ʙo oʙi farovon seroʙason mekunem
72|17|To onhoro ʙo on [ne'matho] ʙiozmoem. Va har kas az jod [-u zikri] Parvardigoras ru ʙartoʙad, [Alloh taolo] uro ʙa azoʙe saxt giriftor mesozad
72|18|Va in ki masocid az oni Alloh taolo ast, pas, kasero ʙo Alloh taolo [ʙa parastisu jorixohi] naxoned
72|19|Va in ki hangome ki ʙandai Alloh taolo [Muhammad] qijom kard, to Uro ʙixonad [va iʙodat kunad], nazdik ʙud, ki [az izdihom ʙar girdi u] ʙar sari ham furu rezand»
